message.body: Hannibal sent me after not answering my calls for days: There are no hard feelings and I'm not mad I still love you and want to be a part of your life but I am not worthy enough to stand next to you in the caacity that we had you most of all should understand this because we have discussed the topic several times and at some length bill bob mark and I will aways be there to rally to your banner (even though you are a Jew) we still love you I still love you and will be there for you but we must harden ourseles to this reality I love you dearly and do not want current feelings to destroy our future companionship. Try to remember that I do care for you a lot My phone is dying so this will be it for a while I love you and will be there for you when your ready.
FYI just want you to know
Dude that's be
B s
Saying its bc he's worthy of you is bull shit-that's not his decision to make
*not worthy
You should say that. If he doesn't want to be a you he needs to just say that
*with you
Bc that's what he's really saying
Well if that's the case then I know it now. I hate it
Yeah he's breaking up w you
He's just too cowardly to say it?
Can I call you after 3?
After four.
Dude I'm super pissed. I worked for this other guy yesterday and he requested to work with me for a month or so
So I went to ask the office and they were like no you need to be here
And I'm here and they have nothing for me to do. One of the women wouldn't even talk to me
I don't get it
Yes your right. I'm getting rejected and dumped by someone I love.
It sucks
But I'll survive
Hmmm can you ask?
Or is that weird?
Maybe they get a tax break for having a work study person
